plot: When an infamous gunslinger kills an innocent on a job gone awry, he mus confront the evil within him before he, too, meets his maker.
title: Dust Devils
plot_es: When an infamous gunslinger kills an innocent on a job gone awry, he mus confront the evil within him before he, too, meets his maker.
plot_en: When an infamous gunslinger kills an innocent on a job gone awry, he mus confront the evil within him before he, too, meets his maker.
